Welcome to ga4_data_import’s documentation!¶

ga4_data_import.common.get_project_number(project_id)¶

Get the project number from the project id.

Parameters:

project_id – The project id to get the project number from.

Returns:

str, The project number.

ga4_data_import.compute.add_server_pub_key(project_id, zone, instance_name, key, sftp_username)¶

Add the provided SSH public key to the instance metadata.

Parameters:

  • project_id – The project id.

  • zone – The zone to create the instance in.

  • instance_name – The name of the instance.

  • sftp_username – The username to create on the instance.

  • key – SSH public key value

Returns:

None

ga4_data_import.compute.create_instance(instance_name, project_id, zone, static_address, bucket_name, sftp_username, service_account_email=None)¶

Create a Compute Engine instance with the provided name, project id, zone, and bucket name. :param instance_name: The name of the instance. :param project_id: The project id. :param zone: The zone to create the instance in. :param static_address: The static address to assign to the instance. :param sftp_username: The username to create on the instance. :param bucket_name: The name of the bucket to mount on the instance.

ga4_data_import.compute.create_static_address(project_id, region, instance_name)¶

Create a static address with the provided name, project id, and region. :param project_id: The project id. :param region: The region to create the address in. :param instance_name: The name of the instance.

Returns:

str, The static address.

ga4_data_import.storage.add_bucket_read_access(bucket_name: str, service_account_email: str)¶

Add read access to the bucket for the compute service account.

Parameters:

  • project_id – The project id.

  • bucket_name – The name of the bucket to add read access to.

ga4_data_import.storage.create_bucket(bucket_name: str, region: str)¶

Create a new bucket with the provided name in the provided project.

Parameters:

  • project_id – The project id.

  • bucket_name – The name of the bucket to create.

  • region – The region to create the bucket in.

Returns:

None
